publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7460 Dr Richard Simpson: Scotland’s Rugby World Ranking—That the Parliament notes what it considers to be the significant victory by Scotland’s rugby team over the world champions, South Africa, and congratulates Andy Robinson and the entire squad for achieving Scotland’s highest-ever world ranking of sixth.
S3M-7460 Scotland’s Rugby World Ranking (lodged on 22 November 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Sarah Boyack*
